elements.name: environment131
elements.html:
{workshop_course} Workshop - Day {day}

We're eager to hear how you're doing and what your facilitator(s) can do to improve, so we ask that you please take 5 minutes to complete this survey.

Your anonymous feedback will be shared with your facilitator(s), {regional_partner_name} and the Code.org staff.

Thank you for your time and honesty!

elements.name: feel_prepared
elements.title: I feel more prepared to teach {workshop_course} than I did at the beginning of the day.

elements.name: love_curriculum
elements.title: I love teaching with this curriculum.

elements.name: teacher_comfort
elements.title: I feel comfortable collaborating with teachers in my cohort and asking for support.

elements.name: teacher_community
elements.title: I feel like I am connected to a community of teachers in my {workshop_course} workshop.

elements.name: excited_about_tomorrow
elements.title: I am excited about what we will do next time in this workshop.

elements.name: what_supported
elements.title: What supported your learning the most today and why?

elements.name: what_detracted
elements.title: What detracted from your learning today and why?

elements.name: discuss_tomorrow
elements.title: What is one thing you hope to discuss or learn more about the next time we meet?
